lessons-desc: Read and share Quranic lessons of Ayah {{ayahNumber}} of Surah {{surahName}}
lessons-disclaimer: Lessons are informed insights from scholars and seekers of knowledge, distinct from primary sources such as Tafsir (the scholarly interpretation of the Quran).
lessons-not-available: There are no reviewed lessons for this ayah

q-and-a.explore_answers_tooltip: 'Explore Answers' is a curated list of thoughtful questions and essential notes relating to specific verses that will enhance your understanding and connection with the Quran.

qiraat.no-junctures: No variant readings available for this verse
qiraat.title: Qiraat

query-param-message: You are viewing preselected reading settings. <0>Dismiss</0> to view in your current settings or <1>Save</1> to update your setting
reading-bookmark-info-tooltip: Your reading bookmark helps you keep track of where you left off in your Quran reading journey. You can set it to any verse, and it will be saved across all your devices when you sign in.
reciter-summary: Recitation source: With kind permission of Tafsir Center
reflection-disclaimer: Reflections are personal perspectives (reviewed for quality) and should not be taken as authoritative.
reflection-not-available: There are no reviewed reflections for this ayah
reflections-desc: Read and share Quranic reflections of Ayah {{ayahNumber}} of Surah {{surahName}}
revelation-order-notice: Note: you're navigating the Quran by the order of revelation. <link>Click here</link> to revert to the default ordering.
share-your-reflection: Share your reflection on this ayah
text-copied: Text has been copied to the clipboard!

translation-feedback.placeholder: Use this space to report an issue relating to the selected translation of this Ayah.

wbw-helper-text: Select options to show translation, transliteration, and/or recitation for each word.
